column2: As an Admin, I want to be able to Create, Update, and Delete restaurants
column14:
Only Admin users should be able to create, update, and delete restaurants. For other users, these buttons should not be visible.

__Acceptance Criteria:__
* CRUD buttons/links for restaurants should only be visible to Admin users
* Only Admin users can use these routes

column2: As a User, I want to be able to create new reviews.
column14:
As a logged-in User, I should be able to see the Create Review button and create a review.

__Acceptance Criteria:__
* New Review button should be visible to logged-in users
* New reviews can be created by logged-in users only
* The user's name is automatically included in the review
column17: New Review button should be visible to logged-in users
column19: New reviews can be created by logged-in users only
column21: The user's name is automatically included in the review

column2: As a visitor of the site, I want to be able to create an account by signing in with an OAuth service in order to write reviews for restaurants.
column14:
As a visitor of your site, I want to be able to create an account so that I can write reviews. I also want to be able to register and login via an OAuth service (like LinkedIn, Google, or Facebook).

__Acceptance Criteria:__
* There is a login/register link/button on the homepage
* When it is clicked on, it goes to verify the user via the external service
* A new user is created in a database when everything goes successfully
* The user is logged in on success and redirected to the homepage
column17: There is a login/register link/button on the homepage
column19: When it is clicked on, it goes to verify the user via the external service
column21: A new user is created in a database when everything goes successfully
column23: The user is logged in on success

column2: As a visitor of the site, I should not be able to see any links related to creating, editing, or deleting.
column14:
Visitors to the site should not be able to take any actions that manipulate the database. This includes creating, updating, or deleting anything.

__Acceptance Criteria:__
* Buttons that perform CRUD operations on your database should be hidden for regular visitors (but, don't delete them!)
